title: Beaded Strip
description: beaded strip with bead fringe at each end; dark blue with diamond motifs in blue, red, white and green, and bars with crosses in green, red and white
creditline: Gift of Jeanne T. Hemphill, Stuart R. Hemphill, Scott A. Hemphill, and James T. Hemphill in memory of Ronda M. Hemphill
